parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description:
The ID of the container cluster.

>  You can call the [DescribeGroupedContainerInstances](~~DescribeGroupedContainerInstances~~) operation to query the IDs of container clusters.

parameters.name: ContainerFieldName
parameters.description:
The name of the container field. Valid values:

*   **clusterId**: the ID of the cluster
*   **image**: the name of the image
*   **imageId**: the ID of the image
*   **namespace**: the namespace

parameters.name: ContainerFieldValue
parameters.description: The value of the container field.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The number of the page to return.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description:
The ID of the asset group.

> You can call the [DescribeAllGroups](~~DescribeAllGroups~~) operation to query the IDs of asset groups.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and the response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page.

parameters.name: RiskName
parameters.description: The name of the risk item.

parameters.name: RiskStatus
parameters.description:
The status of the baseline check. Valid values:

*   **1**: failed
*   **3**: passed

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the check item. Valid values:

*   **1**: failed
*   **2**: verifying
*   **3**: passed
*   **5**: expired
*   **6**: ignored

parameters.name: StrategyId
parameters.description: The ID of the baseline check policy.

parameters.name: TargetType
parameters.description:
The type of the query condition. Valid values:

*   **uuid**: the ID of an asset

parameters.name: TypeName
parameters.description:
The level-1 type of check items.

>  You can call the [DescribeRiskType](~~DescribeRiskType~~) operation to query the level-1 types of check items.

parameters.name: Uuids
parameters.description:
The UUID of the asset.

>  You can call the [DescribeCloudCenterInstances](~~DescribeCloudCenterInstances~~) operation to query the UUIDs of assets.
